instruction.value: DAY -5. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY -2. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY +1. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY +4. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
Administer on DAY -5 and DAY -2 prior to autologous stem cell transplant. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds.
DAY 1 of 42. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 8 of 42. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 22 of 42. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 29 of 42. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 4 of 21. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 8 of 21. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY 11 of 21. Administer over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.

DAY 1, 8, 15 and 22 of 28. Once weekly for 4 weeks. Administer dose over 3 to 5 seconds into a free flowing 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride infusion. Run in the remaining 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes.
DAY -5. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY -2. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY +1. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY +4. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
Administer on DAY -5 and DAY -2 prior to autologous stem cell transplant, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 1 of 42. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 8 of 42. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 22 of 42. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 29 of 42. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 4 of 21. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 8 of 21. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 11 of 21. Administer once, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.
DAY 1, 8, 15 and 22 of 28. Administer once weekly for 4 weeks, as per AHS CancerControl Parenteral Drug Manual.

additionalnotes.value: If ANC is greater than or equal to 1 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Give chemotherapy as ordered.
There must be at least 72 hours between bortezomib doses.

If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.0 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Proceed. If ANC is less than 1.0 X 109/L OR platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: HOLD. There must be at least 72 hours between bortezomib doses.
If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.0 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Proceed. If ANC is less than 1.0 X 109/L OR platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: HOLD.

If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.0 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Proceed with treatment. If ANC is less than 1.0 X 109/L OR platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: Dosage adjustment required. Notify prescriber.

If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.0 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Proceed with treatment. If ANC is less than 1.0 X 109/L OR platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: Dosage adjustment required. Notify prescriber. At least 72 hours should elapse between consecutive bortezomib doses.
If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.0 X 109/L AND platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Proceed. If ANC is less than 1.0 X 109/L OR platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: HOLD.
